mapper.select: select SEQ,count,pno as product_no, product_name, product_category, product_introduce1,product_introduce2, product_company, product_alcohol,product_dosu,product_sweet,product_acidity, product_soda, product_material, product_price,product_stock,product_point,product_thumbnail,product_status,product_date from (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY b.count desc nulls last, A.product_date desc)AS SEQ, b.*, A.*, a.product_no as pno FROM product A left join (select product_no, count(*) as count from tb_order group by product_no) b on a.product_no = b.product_no where product_status = '판매')where seq >= 1 and seq <= 16
